attributes.action: Stop the discrimination in schools; particularly hair length.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many schools in the U.K. do not allow male pupils to have their hair at any length that they choose. This is discrimination and should not be allowed as schools can be prosecuted for discriminating against gender, ethnicity etc. It is a discriminatory offense and should not be allowed to continue in U.K. schools.
